def_en: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which contrasts with the statement in the main clause.

def_cn: 虽然（表示惊奇或出乎意料）
def_en: You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which contains a statement which makes the main clause of the sentence seem surprising or unexpected.
You use although to introduce a subordinate clause which gives some information that is relevant to the main clause but modifies the strength of that statement.

def_cn: 尽管;虽然（表示承认所述是事实）
def_en: You use although when admitting a fact about something which you regard as less important than a contrasting fact.
